Package scenegraph

Provides classes for all scene graph components: cameras, lights, geometries, materials, colors with all their attributes. Hierarchical grouping of objects is provided by Group.
Since:
1.0
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChannelInterface
    Interface for objects, having a channel.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstCamera
    Base class for camera handling.
    AbstGeometry
    This is the base class for all objects in the scene, which need to be drawn.
    AbstLight
    Base class for different type of light sources within the scene.
    AbstMeshData
    Base class for mesh data storage.
    AbstNode
    Base class for all node objects in the scene graph.
    AbstRenderState
    Base class for state control of the render engine.
    AbstSceneObject
    Base class for scene graph objects and objects who store date for the scene graph objects (e.g. mesh data, which is used by TriangleMesh).
    AbstSpatial
    Base class for all spatial components in the scene graph.
    AmbientLight
    Class for storing and providing access to the Ambient light's attributes
    Blendshape
    Class for blend shape deforming (morphing).
    Channel
    Class for data flow to object attributes.
    Color  
    ColorState
    Class to store and provide access to the color state attributes.
    Cone
    Cone mesh.
    Cube
    Cube mesh.
    Cylinder
    Cylinder mesh.
    Group
    Class that implements a group node in the scenegraph.
    Joint
    Class that implements a group node in the scenegraph.
    Line
    Class for polygon lines.
    MaterialState
    Class to store and provide access to the render engine's material attributes.
    ParticleGroup
    Class for a group of particles.
    PerspectiveCamera
    Class modeling the perspective camera, basically storing and providing access to FOV (Field of View) (all other attributes are in parent class)
    Point
    Class for points.
    PointLight
    Class for storing and providing access to the Point light's attributes
    PrimitiveData
    Wrapper class for basic data types.
    SkinCluster
    Class for a set of vertices connected to a skeleton.
    SkyBox
    Class for basic geometric shapes: Cube, Sphere, Torus, Teapot, Cone and Tetrahedron.
    Sphere
    Sphere mesh.
    StaticMesh
    Vertex Storage for static meshes
    TextureState
    Class to store and provide access to the render engine's material attributes.
    Torus
    Torus mesh.
    TriangleMesh
    Class provides storage and management for triangle meshes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstLight.lightType
    Light types, currently only LT_POINT and LT_AMBIENT implemented
    AbstRenderState.renderType
    render states, currently only material and color implemented (textures, fog, etc. for future)
    PrimitiveData.Type
    data type which is wrapped within the channel
    TextureState.TexTarget  
    TextureState.TexType
